programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kevin Downey Jr. - (Seriously), Please Pray for Me
programme.desc: New York City comedian and Las Vegas regular, Kevin Downey Jr. covers a wide variety of topics from reading a book on how to be a better comedian and why he doesn't drink anymore.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Kim Kerley - Do You Know Her?
programme.desc: Having spent much of her teens homeless, Kim Kerley has seen things in life that many never see. She’s chosen to find the funny in those situations. A keen observer of life’s crazy conditions, her comedy comes from real life. A regular on San Antonio Living, Kim has been performing stand-up comedy for over 13 years. She has traveled extensively in the U.S. and abroad, including an inspiring stint with Armed Forces Entertainment. She was also an actress with the comedy group, Laff Stock. She is an actor with Dramatic Diva Productions, putting on community plays in the San Antonio area. Kim also performed comedy on “The View”. She helmed San Antonio’s number 2 drive-time morning radio show. She also handled production duties for Cox Media in San Antonio and was also on the Y-100 morning show. She has shared the stages with comedy greats like Carlos Mencia, Ron White, Lewis Black and many others.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg - WE SAY BIM
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.

programme.title: Bengt Washburn - Poking a Grizzly
programme.desc: Bengt Washburn is an Aquarius with Hazel eyes who prefers boxer briefs, solid deodorants, and Crest toothpaste. He is 5’9? tall, weighs about 149 pounds and can bench 150 pounds three times without a spotter. He has a vertical leap of 16 inches. 8 years ago a lump appeared on his right thigh. It’s not visible from the stage but according to some kids at the water park, it looks creepy. Many people say Bengt looks kind of like a monkey. Bengt Washburn was born in Salt Lake City, Utah but grew up in a large Utah town (1,200 people) as the fifth child in a small Mormon family (7 children). Bengt is married to an officer in the United States Airforce. They have lived in 6 different cities over the last eleven years. Most recently he moved to Springfield, Virginia (Washington D.C.) after living in Stuttgart, Germany for 3 years. Bengt is a former winner of the prestigious San Francisco International Comedy Competition. He has been seen on The Late Late Show with Craig Fergusen, Live at Gotham on Comedy Central and most recently Conan on TBS. He was invited to perform at the Vancouver International Comedy Festival, The Boston Comedy Festival, the Aspen Laff Festival and Gilda’s Laugh Fest in Grand Rapids, Michigan. He’s been heard on NPR, PRI and Bob and Tom. All three of his comedy Cd’s can be heard playing on XM Sirius radio. Most people who know him would say Bengt is a logistically impaired ditz, but his comedy is described as intelligent, surprisingly universal considering the content matter and profoundly funny.

programme.title: Kevin Jordan - Cause I Said So
programme.desc: A Former Los Angeles Police Officer, Kevin has thrilled audiences at Clubs, on Cruise ships, and for the troops worldwide. Kevin is also an Award-winning author, who has opened for John Legend and Gladys Knight.

programme.title: Lee Hardin - Not Quite a Grown-Up
programme.desc: Lee Hardin is a comedian known for making bad decisions and his love for Taco Bell.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Tom Foss - Walking Shoes
programme.desc: Tom Foss has traveled around the world entertaining our troops. Including 5 tours to Iraq, 6 tours of Afghanistan, 11 tours of the middle east, 4 tours of Europe, 3 tours of the Far East, Greenland, 5 aircraft carriers, support ships and bases all around the United States. While not on tour overseas Foss keeps his foot on the ground as a regular at the Improvs, Funnybones and the world famous Hollywood Comedy Store.

programme.title: Jeff Big Daddy Wayne - Big Daddy Kicks It
programme.desc: Comedian Jeff Wayne was dubbed “Big Daddy” by Billy Crystal and Robin Williams on an HBO Comic Relief show. The moniker has stuck to a guy who’s been part of the stand-up comedy scene for a long time. He’s toured all over the world, several times in Europe. The Norwegian Newspaper “Sondags B.A.”, described him as having “amazing audience communication, and ferociously funny!”

programme.title: Bone Hampton - It Is What It Is
programme.desc: As down home as collards and cornbread, as sharp as a pickaxe, and as funny as a possum in a petticoat, Comedian Bone Hampton is a master at making audiences feel like family. His clean, homespun humor, sharp wit, and easy delivery makes the Dove Award-winning "Comedian of the Year" one of the most highly sought after performers in the business. With more than 20 years in the game, his résumé is ever expanding with impressive stage and TV credits. The Texas native has logged countless appearances on ABC's "The View," including two stints as Guest Co-Host, and has served as personal gag writer for Actress/Comedienne Sherri Shepherd since 2010. He's also appeared on ABC's "Less Than Perfect," NBC's "My Name is Earl," BET's "Comic View," and the syndicated talk show Comics Unleashed with host Byron Allen. And yes, that is Bone in the very funny national commercial for Church's Chicken. No stranger to the big screen, Bone has appeared alongside Hollywood juggernaut Sandra Bullock in the romantic comedy "All About Steve," and can be seen in the film "Woodlawn" starring Sean Austin and Oscar winner Jon Voight. Bone took a leap of faith and moved to Los Angeles to pursue comedy full-time. Nothing could have prepared him for the culture shock that greeted him. Next to the hardcore acts he shared the stage with, his family-friendly routine seemed soft. But that fish-out-of-water experience inspired him to remain true to himself and to his God—no matter where he performed. He set out to carve out a niche all his own. (And carve he did!) In 2005, the Urban Gospel Alliance named him “Comedian of the Year.” His mission was simple—“I just like to have a good time. I just want to be the ringleader of the good time,” Bone says. Ask anyone who’s ever seen Bone Hampton perform, they will tell you: Mission accomplished. Bone can be heard all day long on satellite radio, and caught on TV anytime your television is on.

programme.title: Mike Siegel - Have Jokes, Will Travel
programme.desc: Mike Siegel is a stand-up comedian, TV host, and actor. For nine years, he hosted TBS network’s TBS Movie EXTRA and has hosted numerous other network shows including HGTV’s If Walls Could Talk and What You Get For the Money, GSN Live on the Game Show Network, and The Next GAC Star on GAC. Along with numerous appearances as a panelist on E! network’s hit show Chelsea Lately, Mike has performed stand-up comedy on many television shows, including Last Comic Standing (NBC), The Late Late Show (CBS), Late Friday (NBC), Comedy Showcase with Louie Anderson (NBC), Stand-up, Stand-up (Comedy Central), and Friday Night (NBC). Mike’s also been seen on the small screen as an actor. He was a recurring guest star on the CBS drama JAG, and had supporting roles in Mike and Molly (CBS), Rules of Engagement (ABC), 24 (FOX), Prison Break (FOX), Better Off Ted (ABC), Less Than Perfect (ABC), Eve (UPN), Strong Medicine (Lifetime), Andy Richter Controls the Universe (FOX), and Sabrina (WB).

programme.title: Key Lewis - Half Black, Half White, Looks Mexican
programme.desc: Sacramento California born Key Lewis is a high energy, improvisational, storytelling, multiple-personality nutcase! His love for the people and hunger for the stage is his undying motivation. His comedic stories about his interracial childhood, family, and unusual views on relationships, make Key simply a joy to watch. His ability to improvise and interact with all types of crowds makes this up and coming comic and actor one to look out for. Key Lewis has appeared on Marlon Wayans TBSís Funniest Wins, Starz Networks StaannDup, Kevin Harts One Mic Stand as well as Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes! Key says, chase your dream, always know your audience donít act funny, be funny... donít worry about the quantity of your material but the quality the sooner you create a relationship with your crowd, the better you will be. Television: Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes on TVONE. BETíS One Mic Stand Hosted by Kevin Hart. Starz Network Comedy Series called StaannDup, Marlon Wayanís TBSís Funniest Wins! Competitions: Winner of the 2013 Rocky Mountain Laugh Off, Finalist in the 2010 Bay Area Black Comedy Competition, Semi-Finalist 2009 San Francisco International Comedy Competition, a Semi-Finalist in the 2008 Boston Comedy Festival, 2007 Seattle International Comedy Competition Finalist, Shades of Laughs Portland Oregon Winner, TVONE Bill Bellamyís Who Got Jokeís Contestant. Radio: Improv work with FM Morning Shows (Top 40 Radio): KSFM 102.5 (Sacramento, CA), KWOD 106.5 (Sacramento, CA) KWIN 97.7 ñ Stockton/Lodi, CA, Mix 107.9 Salt Lake City UT (Is It Racist Segment) & The Man Panel. Concerts/Festivals: Opened for Jon B. and Keysha Cole, Taste Of Tacoma, & Bite Of Seattle Fountain Stage 5 Years Running! Key Lewis has worked with the likes of Kevin Hart, Pablo Francisco, Sam Bam, Alonzo Bodden, Jay London, Gabriel Iglesias, Brooks McBeth, Tommy Davidson, Katt Williams, De-Ray Davis, Andrew Norelli, Lonnie Love, Jeff Garcia, Damon Wayans, Joey Diaz, Guy Torry, Darren Carter, Paul Mooney, Kermet Apio and many more.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - The Little Unicorn
programme.desc: The Little Unicorn is a tale of whimsy, fantasy, and extremely generous definitions of the word “little.” This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Tale of Moose Baby
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short about Moose Baby! "But what is it about?" you quite reasonably ask. It is not about anything. It is Moose Baby. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for The Tale of Moose Baby!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Blood Theater
programme.desc: Every time the Blood Theatre has opened for business, someone has died. But this time, the most incompetent theater owner in town has a good feeling about his chances! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Behavior Of Domestic Pigs
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the educational short Behavior Of Domestic Pigs! Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they learn all about the Behavior Of Domestic Pigs!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX PRESENTS - Freddie Steps Out
programme.desc: Regular High school student Freddie is mistaken for the most famous radio singer in the country who happens to be missing. Chaos ensues until the big dance number puts everything right. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Bridget and Mary Jo from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Flash That Smile
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Flash That Smile! Floss your way to fun as Bridget and Mary Jo pull on their neon spandex and take you on a 15 minute oral hygiene adventure.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Mind Ripper
programme.desc: In a remote bunker in the desert, unthinkable experiments are taking place. Experiments where horror legend Wes Craven sells his name and credibility to a movie in exchange for a writing credit for his son Jonathan! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Mysterious Message
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short The Mysterious Message! What is this mysterious message? Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for the answer in The Mysterious Message!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Pressure Point
programme.desc: Sebastian Dellacourt is leading a double life: he tells his wife that he’s a humble systems analyst. But he’s actually a D-list actor starring in films by the director of Time Chasers and Radical Jack! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: VICTORiOUS
programme.desc: A sensational singer, dynamic dancer, and amazing actress is discovered! Tori Vega is accidentally thrown into the spotlight at a musical showcase and offered admission to Hollywood Arts, the most prestigious performing arts high school in the country!

programme.title: VICTORiOUS
programme.desc: A sensational singer, dynamic dancer, and amazing actress is discovered! Tori Vega is accidentally thrown into the spotlight at a musical showcase and offered admission to Hollywood Arts, the most prestigious performing arts high school in the country!

programme.title: Dr. Poppy's Pet Rescue
programme.desc: Come on down to Dr Poppy's Pet Rescue Centre and learn about the amazing animals who come to visit.

programme.title: Mario And Fafa With Friends
programme.desc: A puppet-based video blog with a red bearded humanoid named Mario and a anthropomorphic groundhog named Fafa.

programme.title: Toddler Fun Learning - The Classics
programme.desc: Bright, fun and educational videos for little ones.

programme.title: Learn With Gecko
programme.desc: Laugh and learn with Gecko and the mechanicals at Gecko's Garage.

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: A Doggone Adventure
programme.desc: “Just Jesse the Jack” enlists a group of junior detectives and their dad, host of a popular TV show to help him unravel the mystery behind his telepathic talents. Things get even more mysterious when they find themselves entangled in a world of UFOs!

programme.title: Sox: A Family's Best Friend
programme.desc: When two families come together by marriage, the new brothers struggle to unite and are eventually brought together by a magical dog named Sox.

programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.desc: Bino & Fino is about a brother and sister named Bino and Fino who live with their grandparents 'Mama' and 'Papa' in a modern day city in Africa. Bino and Fino have many adventures where, with the help of their friend Zeena the Magic Butterfly, they discover and learn things about the world.

programme.title: The Day Henry Met
programme.desc: Everyday Henry meets something new - The day Henry met a Whale! The day Henry met the Moon!, The day Henry met a Car! How exciting, I wonder what Henry's going to meet today?

programme.title: TOONBO

programme.title: Raggs
programme.desc: Raggs stars five members of a canine band, Raggs, Trilby, Pido, B. Max and Razzles, and their wise-cracking pet cat, Dumpster, who learn life lessons together in their own cool clubhouse.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, t

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies

programme.title: Doby & Disy: Detective Kubi

programme.desc: Quba uses his Spray Alive on Edward Munch's The Scream in the hopes of shattering the polar ice caps with The Scream's killer vocals. When his plan goes awry, the DaVincis come to the rescue and plan

programme.title: The DaVincibles:Love is Like a Rock
programme.desc: Rick da Rock, teen rockstar, is playing in London and Cherie and Zoe are dying to see him! Tickets to the concert aren't enough for Cherie - she wants Rick da Rock all to herself! Love is in the air

programme.title: The Adventures of Teddy Ruxpin:A Race to the Finish
programme.desc: On the last day of the competition, the Wizard still hasn't chosen the grand prize. In search of Tweeg, Quellor's henchman attack Grunge Village.

programme.title: Todd World:Crazy for Cookies
programme.desc: Stella's newly baked cookies disappear when she leaves them outside to cool. She accuses Benny, a known cookie lover, of eating them until she sees the error in her thinking and finds the true culprit

programme.title: Todd World:The Hoppy-Poppy Pokey

programme.desc: A fun ABC Bathtime Toys song for kids. Parents and educators can use this song to teach toddlers about the Alphabet. / Learning shapes with TuTiTu in the beloved Bathtime Toys.

programme.desc: The two best friends fall out only to find that there is no-one who can quite compare. Audrey the agony ostrich helps bring them back together.

programme.title: Pirata and Capitano:The Right Key
programme.desc: Pirata and Murana are hot on the trail of pirate Sonatine Sardines booty.

programme.title: Pirata and Capitano:Psycho Cyclops' Quest
programme.desc: Racket the Ogre wants to become a pirate.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies:How to Make a Friend Laugh / Speedy Boots / Time Machine
programme.desc: Shiny is very disappointed and all her friends' efforts to cheer her up seem to fail, except for a humorous unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Sunny Bunnies:Elusive cake / Magic mirror / Football team
programme.desc: While having some desserts at the park cafe, Turbo picks up the most mouth-watering cake, but all his friends want exactly the same one!

programme.title: Alphablocks:Pen / Up
programme.desc: P, E and N take on a pesky pen, who can draw anything it wants to escape them. This episode introduces the letter E and the words pen, peg and pet. / U has the balloon ride of his life but doesn't know how to get back down. This episode introduces the letter U and the words up, cup, pup, pop, sum, mug and mud.

programme.title: Cloudbabies:Best Bouncer
programme.desc: Baba Green can't cloud bounce like the others, and it makes him sad.

programme.title: Cloudbabies:Baba Pink's Bossy Day
programme.desc: Baba Pink creates a star chart to monitor each of the Cloudbabies' jobs.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You?:The Lucky Egg
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare & Little Field Mouse are surprised to find an egg lying on the ground. They are at a loss as to what to do with it until Blue Bird agrees to look after it.

programme.title: Wonderballs:Paint Rollers / Popcorn Tree / Mix it up
programme.desc: Puffburt tries to join Kit and Brushy's marble game by using a painted acorn. The trail of color left behind shows the Wonderballs that when it comes to creating art, sometimes you just have to roll w

programme.title: Tiny Square Critters:Marvin Midge / Olrik the Owl / Buller Bear
programme.desc: Marvin Midge always feels sleepy and flies into a tree and bangs his head. When he wakes up he thinks he is a bear. A strong bear. Buller Bear won't have any of it. / In this episode, Olrik the Owl sets out to prove to the rest of the forest creatures that he really is quite smart. / Buller Bear tries to prove to his mother that he can catch wild animals. In the end though Buller is happy to just eat berries.

programme.title: Counting With Paula:Sea Toy Story
programme.desc: One of Paula’s sea toys is missing.

programme.title: Counting With Paula:Treasure Hunting

programme.title: Just Kidding:Benched Prince Charming

programme.title: Willa's Wild Life:An Alligator Ate My Homework / Hammering Away
programme.desc: When Willas school project disappears Gus is wrongfully accused of eating the homework. / Willa and the gang build a giraffe-house for Jenny.

programme.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou:Fair is Fair / Savanna Surfing

programme.title: Download This - Alphabet B-C
programme.desc: From somewhere deep in the wilderness, intrepid photographer Flash sends Owl pictures of an amazing animal for his collection. Can you help Owl guess what extraordinary animal Flash has filmed today?

programme.title: Download This - Alphabet A-B
programme.desc: From somewhere deep in the wilderness, intrepid photographer Flash sends Owl pictures of an amazing animal for his collection. Can you help Owl guess what extraordinary animal Flash has filmed today?

programme.title: DJ Baby - Alphabet P-S
programme.desc: It’s time to shake your tail feathers! When Baby DJ spins the vinyl, get off the sofa and onto the dance floor. Forget the funky chicken and crocodile rock, because this month we’re dancing with the animals of Australia!

programme.title: DJ Baby - Alphabet L-P
programme.desc: It’s time to shake your tail feathers! When Baby DJ spins the vinyl, get off the sofa and onto the dance floor. Forget the funky chicken and crocodile rock, because this month we’re dancing with the animals of Australia!

programme.title: DJ Baby - Alphabet G-K
programme.desc: It’s time to shake your tail feathers! When Baby DJ spins the vinyl, get off the sofa and onto the dance floor. Forget the funky chicken and crocodile rock, because this month we’re dancing with the animals of Australia!

programme.title: Toss That Carrot / Beware The Monster
programme.desc: Kooki is a wacky, peppy red panda who LOVES to make things. She babbles away in her own special language, but that’s okay, as each episode is narrated by a special little friend (who also helps translate). Every show has Kooki making two different things - from big, fun cardboard cutout creations to small, delightful handiworks. Whatever she’s doing, she’s always having fun and will inspire kids to unleash the wild side of their creativity.

programme.title: It's Cold Out There / Birds in a Tree
programme.desc: It's not snowing inside, it's just coconut for Kooki's edible snowman and she makes the biggest pinwheel you've ever seen.

programme.title: Play it for me Kooki / Sleep on a Cloud
programme.desc: Kooki is a wacky, peppy red panda who LOVES to make things. She babbles away in her own special language, but that’s okay, as each episode is narrated by a special little friend (who also helps translate). Every show has Kooki making two different things - from big, fun cardboard cutout creations to small, delightful handiworks. Whatever she’s doing, she’s always having fun and will inspire kids to unleash the wild side of their creativity.

programme.title: Roll It / Zoom Zoom

programme.title: DJ Baby - Alphabet L-P
programme.desc: It’s time to shake your tail feathers! When Baby DJ spins the vinyl, get off the sofa and onto the dance floor. Forget the funky chicken and crocodile rock, because this month we’re dancing with the animals of Australia!

programme.title: Whale Adventures With Nigel Marven
programme.desc:
"An Incredible Journey Begins" - The newborn gray whale calves spend their first months of life in the safety of Baja's San Ignacio Lagoon, suckling and learning swimming skills before starting the first leg of their incredible journey. Nigel is spellbound by the 'friendly whales', mothers and calves that literally beg for his attention, rolling like puppy-dogs as he strokes them from his boat.
While at the lagoon, Nigel talks to the scientists studying the whales, and finds unexpected birds of prey nesting at the water's edge. As the whales start their journey north towards the border with the US, he takes a parallel road trip through the cacti-studded desert, meeting rattlesnakes, lizards and antelope en route.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''All's Whale that Ends Whale'' - Whale Sharks despite their size, are shrouded in mystery. Join host Jeff Corwin and the scientists of Georgia Aquarium as they strive to understand more about these amazing animals.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Animals in Human Care'' - Follow host Jeff Corwin as he gets a behind-the-scenes look at how these aquarists keep the animals such as bottlenose dolphins and beluga whales well fed, healthy, and thriving.

programme.title: Whale Adventures With Nigel Marven
programme.desc:
"North to the Golden Gate" - The whales' journey takes them right up the coast of California, where the hustle and bustle of human activity is a stark contrast to the peace of the Mexican desert. Nigel takes a boat into the Santa Barbara channel to catch up with the greys as they swim past, and meets some even bigger whales, humpbacks, putting on an awe-inspiring acrobatic display. A little further out are the Channel Islands, protected havens for a huge variety of animals, both above and below the waves. Nigel plunges underwater to swim in the forests of kelp, and on the island of Santa Cruz he's led on a merry dance by a unique and diminutive fox.
Continuing north, the whales and the presenter pass Big Sur, an incredible landscape home to an incredible creature - the Californian condor. Like the grey whales, this rare bird came back from the brink of extinction thanks to conservation efforts. Travelling across the Golden Gate Bridge to the far north of the State, Nigel finishes his Californian adventure in Redwood National Park, among giant trees that have been alive since the time of Ancient Rome.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Jeff's Favorite Moments'' - Host Jeff Corwin relives some of his favorite animal moments from the show including an adventure with mighty humpback whales, Kodiak bears, an adorable baby dolphin, and ancient New England sturgeon.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Thar' She Blows!'' - Host Jeff Corwin travels to the remote coastlines of Alaska for a once-in-a-lifetime adventure with humpback whales. Jeff teams up with scientists who study whale behavior and work to understand the fascinating feeding habits of these massive mammals.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''The Secrets of Sharks'' - Along the majestic islands of French Polynesia, host Jeff Corwin explores one of the largest ocean sanctuaries on earth and comes face to face with a family of humpback whales.

programme.title: Ocean Mysteries with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: ''Birds of a Feather'' - Host Jeff Corwin visits with a group of well-dressed penguins at Georgia Aquarium, then journeys out to the Breton National Wildlife Refuge in Louisiana to study the Brown Pelican and the efforts in place to protect this species.

programme.desc: ''World Champion Pesto'' - Genoa, Italy. Josh explores the culture and cuisine of this historic Mediterranean port.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: A murderer tries to kill his final victim as the car they are in slowly sinks to the bottom of a lake. The only way to save the victim is to rescue her as the car continues to sink. We test fire multiple handguns underwater to see if you can actually penetrate a car windshield and save the victim.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction?
programme.desc: In this iconic scene, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. We construct a giant shark on a motorized platform to test if you can hit, and explode, the tank with an M1 Garand rifle while perched in a precarious position.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Here are amazing projects – based on science – that you can build yourself, all with things you can buy at a hardware store. Host Steve Spangler shows how to create your own t-shirt launcher. Plus, discover the substance that makes jelly slide.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Fill a glass with water and make the water disappear! How to do it? Well, the secret is inside a product that’s on the shelves of your supermarket. Host Steve Spangler roams the supermarket for things you can use to create your own science magic.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler shows how every day can be a spooky day with scary tricks and magic effects all based on science. Stage your own zombie party, complete with eerie, smoking beverages supernatural bubbles and fake blood.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler reveals the secrets to science tricks and stunts that will amaze your friends. They’re all some of his favorite experiments – like explosive bubbles you can hold in your hand and freezing water with your mind!

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler relaxes in his backyard with science tricks and inventions you can create outdoors. He exposes the secret to opening a car door with the power of your brain. And he reveals how to balance a ball on a spray of water.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci

programme.title: Invasion of Blood Farmers
programme.desc: Somewhere in upstate New York, a secretive group of farmers are harvesting human blood for a mysterious purpose.

programme.title: War of the God Monsters
programme.desc: When gigantic creatures start to appear in South Korea a doctor and journalist must find a way to save themselves, and the world.

programme.title: The Night Visitor
programme.desc: In a Scandinavian insane asylum, a convicted murderer escapes at night to exact his revenge on those who he deems responsible.

programme.title: The Bird With the Crystal Plumage
programme.desc: When an American writer in Italy witnesses an attempted murder, a serial killer begins stalking him, drawing him deep into the investigation.

programme.title: Cat O' Nine Tails
programme.desc: A newsman works with a blind puzzle-solver to catch a killer with mixed-up chromosomes in Dario Argento's giallo classic.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: During her first night on the job, a rookie EMT and her partner pick up a wounded superhero and are pulled into his mission to save Los Angeles from a sinister organization.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna is stuck: she's approaching 30 and living like a hermit in her mum's garden shed, avoiding life as she still copes with the loss of her brother.

programme.title: Blue Iguana
programme.desc: Small time crooks Eddie and Paul are in over their heads when a cute London lawyer hires them to steal a rare jewel. Meanwhile, a mullet-haired gangster wants the gem for himself. Bullets and sparks fly in this pond-hopping comedic caper.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Flying Tigers
programme.desc: John Wayne adds luster to this early WWII film about the famous P-40 Flying Group who soared into battle against the Japanese in defense of China's freedom, Great dogfight scenes!

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Is Paris Burning?
programme.desc: The courage-filled story of the Allied Resistance and the Paris Liberation of 1944. As the Nazi jackboot marches through Europe, the freedom fighters of Paris mount a brave resistance.

programme.title: Donovans Reef
programme.desc: Acclaimed director John Ford and screen legend John Wayne team up for what would be their final collaboration in this boisterous, rowdy South Seas escapade.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: An upscale, urban family that can't seem to get along gets stranded in a remote, impoverished lumber town two days before Christmas. Stars Lauren Holly and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: Back When We Were Grown Ups
programme.desc: Based on Anne Tyler's novel, the movie centers on Rebecca Davitch, a 53-year-old single mother and grandmother, and the cast of her colorful family around her. Stars Blythe Danner.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Anne Heche stars as a recently-divorced mom who wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect. An entertaining but unfortunate series of Christmas Eve mishaps ensures that won't happen.

programme.title: The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl-next-door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: The Runaway
programme.desc: Racial tensions flare in 1949 Georgia when an old murder case involving the deaths of three black men is reopened. Stars Dean Cain, Pat Hingle, and Maya Angelou. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, and discover they're not alone.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: After being unmasked during a heist, an infiltration expert finds herself mixed up in a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Red Violin
programme.desc: A red violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: A 5-year-old Indian is adopted by a couple in Australia 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

programme.title: Crossing Over
programme.desc: This ensemble piece focuses on immigrants of different nationalities trying to achieve legal status in LA.

programme.title: Stonehearst Asylum
programme.desc: An Oxford grad (Jim Sturgess, "Across the Universe") accepts a job at a mental asylum and soon discovers that its "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane and horrific.

programme.title: Electric Love
programme.desc: In this relatable romantic comedy, four couples traverse the modern dating scene in Los Angeles utilizing popular dating apps.

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: Assistant funeral director Bernie Tiede (Jack Black) is one of the most-beloved residents in the small Texas town of Carthage. Sunday-school teacher, choir member and creator of spectacular funerals, Bernie is a friend to everyone, including Marjorie Nugent (Shirley MacLaine), a rich but nasty widow whom no one else likes. When Marjorie is found shot to death and stuffed in a freezer, Bernie is charged with the murder, and concerned Carthage citizens immediately spring to his defense.

programme.title: Sprinter
programme.desc: A Jamaican teen burdened by family troubles hopes his rise in track and field can reunite him with his mother.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery
programme.desc: A street-wise man (Freddie Prinze Jr.) gets mixed up in a scheme involving a pool shark (Ving Rhames) and a crooked lawman.

programme.title: The Monster Squad
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: The Monster Squad
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: Young Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a plague of bizarre, puzzling murders grip London, young Holmes and his new found friend Watson find themselves unwittingly entangled in the dark mystery.

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: In 1999, Officer Dave Brown (Woody Harrelson), a 24-year veteran of the Los Angeles Police Department, tends to follow his own code of rough justice. A number of years earlier, he was implicated in the death of a serial rapist. Brown's violent tendencies once again land him in hot water when a video of him beating up a suspect plays all over local TV. An assistant DA (Sigourney Weaver) pressures him to retire, but Brown edges closer and closer to a meltdown.

programme.title: Blunt Force Trauma
programme.desc: In the seedy underground dueling culture of South America, two opponents wearing Kevlar vests face each other, draw and shoot. With Mickey Rourke.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as a tough cop who's dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. Also featuring Paddy Considine and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: After a massive asteroid crashes into the moon, it's discovered that the moon's structure is now entirely unstable, threatening all life on Earth.

programme.title: Johnny Was
programme.desc: "Johnny Was" follows former Irish thug Johnny Doyle as he navigates questions of race and morality in an attempt to avoid all-out war with West Indian Yardies in a Brixton safehouse.

programme.title: Solar Attack
programme.desc: When the sun's increasing expulsions of plasma threaten to ignite methane in our atmosphere, international tensions rise while scientists race for a solution to avoid natural disaster.

programme.title: The BAM: The Willie Johnson Story
programme.desc: The gripping story of how martial arts transformed a criminal into a 7-time World Champion, a community leader and a real man. Willie Johnson tells his story through his own words, from the highs to the lows, and how he has triumphed over it all.

programme.title: The Perfect Prayer
programme.desc: Serenity Scott endures the unthinkable act of both mental and physical abuse from her parents. Parents are supposed to be the ones that kids trust with their life. Moms and dads should be the hero's that make the bad guys disappear and help their children escape the monsters in their dreams. This was not Serenity's case instead her dreams were her reality. Her trust was trampled by her mom Jamie and her heart was broken by her father Kenneth. Serenity loses her faith in God and now she is in search for The Perfect Prayer.

programme.title: The Engagement
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy David, a Jewish American, asks Mia, a beautiful African American, to be his wife-but never dreams what lies ahead when he announces his engagement to his parents. When David's parents surprise him by hosting an engagement party, Mia's African American heritage might just give them the surprise of their lives! To make matters worse, David's parents want a traditional Jewish wedding and Mia's parents demand a traditional Baptist ceremony. As tensions rise throughout the day, will love prevail or will both families tear them apart?

programme.title: Unexceptional Love
programme.desc: Demetria and Shaun are looking to expand their family with a precious gift from God. Demetria faces complications in child birth that leaves her child imperfect by her standards. Demetria must find it in herself to love unexceptionally.

programme.title: Show Me Your Glory
programme.desc: Jackie Powers, a former prostitute for many years, is desperate for change from the emotional, verbal, and physical abuse of her past. With her determination to persevere, Jackie finds new found faith in God and learns that everybody deserves another chance.

programme.title: It Takes a Village
programme.desc: When five middle school aged kids are faced with trials of adolescence they are forced to make important decisions. Will their decisions lead them down a path of destruction or success? When their friendship, parents, community, and teachers form a bond, we see the effects the village really has on society as a whole.

programme.title: Gambler V: Playing For Keeps: Night 2
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers, Loni Anderson, Mariska Hargitay Brady Hawkes has to run to his son's rescue once again in this continuation of the Gambler stories. Jeremiah is now a young man who has become involved with Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid. Brady pursues the gang in order to get Jeremiah out of the gang before he gets in too much trouble with the law.

programme.title: The Baron And The Kid
programme.desc: Johnny Cash, Greg Webb, Tracy Pollan William “The Baron” Addington (Johnny Cash) is a former pool pro whose lifetime of boozing has cost him his career and family. In an attempt to straighten out his life, he quits drinking and plays pool only for charity.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Kim Swims
programme.desc: The inspiring story of an accomplished open water swimmer's attempt to become the first woman to swim 30 miles through a stretch of cold, rough and shark-inhabited waters near the San Francisco coast.

programme.title: Skyman
programme.desc: Carl Merryweather claims he was visited by an alien as child when out camping the desert with his father. Now, thirty years later, he's convinced that same alien is returning for a reunion.

programme.title: The Act of Reading
programme.desc: A retired high school English teacher is confronted by a former student who failed her class 15 years prior. He then prepares for her a belated book report -- an off-kilter documentary on the magic of reading and teaching Moby-Dick.

programme.title: 2 Pigeons
programme.desc: A wide-boy estate agent unknowingly shares his home with a malicious tenant, one with a totally surprising agenda. Alt Two Pigeons is a dark urban morality tale with an underlying streak of jet black comedy.

programme.title: The God Inside My Ear
programme.desc: After experiencing a peculiar and sudden breakup with her boyfriend, elizia discovers a world of conspiracies, strange voices and horrifying visions.

programme.title: The Bill Murray Stories Life Lessons Learned from a Mythical Man
programme.desc: Following one man's journey to find meaning in Bill Murray's many unexpected adventures with people. Whether it be singing karaoke with strangers or crashing a kickball game, Bill Murray shows us what living in the moment is all about.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: A slapstick action and goodtime comedy as an actor and a carhop go the races and get caught in a chase.

programme.title: Nobody's Perfekt
programme.desc: Three slightly disturbed psychiatric patients decide to take on the government.

programme.title: Ishtar
programme.desc: Two hapless lounge singers become embroiled in the political uprising of a small Middle Eastern country.

programme.title: The Squeeze
programme.desc: A down-and-out artist and a no-nonsense bill collector team up to solve a murder and foil a high-stakes scam.

programme.title: Quicksilver
programme.desc: After losing his life savings playing the market, a trader quits his job and becomes a bicycle messenger.

programme.title: 40 Guns To Apache Pass

programme.title: Montana Territory
programme.desc: An idealistic deputy is disillusioned to learn that a sheriff he idolizes is using his badge as a cover for his crimes.

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men
programme.desc: A noble cattleman battles an embittered, rival rancher, who hires ten outlaws to seize power in the territory.

programme.title: Relentless

programme.desc: Randolph Scott is a man branded a coward for not taking part in Custer's disastrous Battle of Little Bighorn.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: A powerful rancher always protects his wild adult son with hush money, until the son's crimes cross the line.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Mattie, a young lady living in a mining camp of the Southwest, unwittingly marries a claim jumper despite the fact she is in love with a gold miner. Soon, the Old West brings her death, confusion, and the hard reality of her claim jumping husband.

programme.title: The Long Riders
programme.desc: Four theatrical families of the 1980s re-create the saga of the 1860s James Gang: Stacy and James Keach, David, Keith and Robert Carradine, Randy and Dennis Quaid and Christopher and Nicholas Guest.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: War Flowers
programme.desc: During the Civil War, an inspired story of tragedy and love, a mother Sarah (Christina Ricci), and her daughter Melody, (Gabrielle Popa) desperately struggle to survive, until an unlikely connection with solider Louis McIntire (Jason Gedrick).

programme.title: Return of the Seven
